item.title: 15 beauty tips for 2015 to celebrate the 15th anniversary of Giorgio Armani Beauty
item.description: Source: L’Oreal. Giorgio Armani Beauty is commemorating the 15th anniversary of its makeup line with a series of 15 instructional videos. Released periodically throughout the year, these short clips will feature Linda Cantello, Giorgio Armani’s International Make-Up Artist, sharing simple makeup techniques and expert advice. While the professional tips are specifically tailored for Armani products, the company asserts that anyone can easily understand and implement them. Curious?Â Check out the videos:
